title: Bug 104630: Column icons not displayed when connecting to Derby database
OB: When attempting to connect to a Derby database, the column icons in the user interface are not being displayed. This occurs consistently for all tables in the database.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application
2. Go to the 'Connect to Database' screen
3. Connect to a Derby database
4. Navigate to the Database Explorer
5. Browse the tables and observe the missing column icons
